name: The Cozy Hostel
description:
Newly renovated, we aim to offer a clean and safe stay to our guest. We are a small chill hostel for international workers and international tourists 

AGE POLICY
In the dormitory : 

18Yo minimum - 35 yo maximum - no kids allowed. 

For private rooms, no age limit - no kids allowed

INTERNATIONAL PASSEPORT REQUIRED

NO LOCALS ACCEPTED

We are a safe house for international travellers only 

Sports groups not accepted - contact us for group bookings 

Checkout 10am - Checkin 2pm, but feel free to come and drop your bag in the morning we will be happy to keep them safe for you until you checkin

$50 deposit required, any breach of house rules will see you evicted

Prepayment 14 days policy - we will charge your booking 100% if it's within the next 14 days 

Prepayment required, failing to prepay, we will contact you to sort it out. However if you do not, we will cancel the booking and you might lose your HW deposit.

Strictly NO REFUND so please book your nights right. 

Thanks

houseRules.notes:
Newly renovated, we aim to offer a clean and safe stay to our guest. We are a small chill motel / hostel 

We have private rooms / family rooms (double bed + bunk bed for groups) and one dormitoru

In the dormitory : 

18Yo minimum - 35 yo maximum - no kids allowed. 

For private rooms, no age limit.

 Sports groups not accepted - contact us for group bookings 

 Checkout 10am - Checkin 2pm, but feel free to come and drop your bag in the morning we will be happy to keep them safe for you until you checkin

$50 deposit required, any breach of house rules will see you evicted

Prepayment 14 days policy - we will charge your booking 100% if it's within the next 14 days 

Prepayment required, failing to prepay, we will contact you to sort it out. However if you do not, we will cancel the booking and you might lose your HW deposit.

Strictly NO REFUND so please book your nights right. 

We are a small business, we have no time to waste waiting for people and then they do not turn up, or people changing their mind few days after booking us 

So please remember : 14 days prepayment required, strictly no cancellation on our policy once payment is done 

Thanks
